Celebrate Pan Macmillan's 70th anniversary with these striking classic reissues

Written by Brandon King · Published Aug 17, 2017

Publisher Pan Macmillan is celebrating 70 years of publishing with the reissue of 20 classic Pan paperbacks in September, in combination with a series of events and promotions throughout the autumn. In homage to "the golden age of paperback publishing", the Pan 70 series features new and witty designs. We have ordered all the titles in the series, so reserve or look out for them at your local library.

Brandon King

I work in the Suffolk Libraries Stock Team
